page.title: 10A farmer's life.
page.content: Mr.Peter Bisson was born at "The Poplars" which is a farm his family has owned since 1690. He showed us the deeds that were writen on pigskin, and has the names of Sarah Josue Bisson. He farms 65 vergees (30 acres), with the aid of machines, by himself. After 1945 he grew tomatoes and potatoes but, with the advent of glasshouses, he changed to growing cauliflowers. Then he moved to spring vegetables and later to winter ones. He now grows rye in order to rotate his crops. He keeps cockerels and 4 pigs for home consumption. He used to have a direct selling vegetable store but now has a tea-room instead. Bread is baked on the premises at the rate of 100 loaves a day.He has 5 children and hopes a son will take on the farm.
